After using skills (excluding Movement Skills and Basic Attack), Atk. Power +1% for 6s. Stacks up to 6 times. When max stacks are reached, Crit Rate +15%. If Cooldown reduction due to skill cancel is applied to this effect, it is applied after the end of the skill.
